plot: A lady, who has been living in Delhi from her marriage in 1972 to the present day, is afflicted by a massacre.
title: Dilli 1984
plot_es: A lady, who has been living in Delhi from her marriage in 1972 to the present day, is afflicted by a massacre.
plot_en: A lady, who has been living in Delhi from her marriage in 1972 to the present day, is afflicted by a massacre.
